Title(s): ‘Ista tria sunt dyshonowret quia sunt confusores cuiuscunque regni et ciuitati’
Subjects: advice, to prelates; advice, to princes; precepts; abuses, of the age; flatterers, against
_description: Three things that to trust in brings dishonour — three lines

Bod692.Transcription:
Grette Aporte In hynesffeþfull trust In falce flateryngeEt
                    Grette Rebikys for Sothe Seynge
